short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: User blocker extension for the Rewired.hu forum community

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a filter for the rewired.hu forum that removes (blocks) unwanted users from the forum. Only works on the front-end so cannot 100% remove a user but it is good enough for most uses.
